Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: nenuca
Reviews.Content: Is a great price for a touch screen cellphone, and it doesn't looks cheap. My only concern was that the seller advertise image shows the usb cable and I didn't recieved it.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: JC "James Brown"
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my girl friend here in Nicaragua. Everything works good and she is very happy with the phone.

Reviews.Title: Software trouble
Reviews.Author: hlhuskins
Reviews.Content: This is overall a good phone. I just had trouble with the software malfunctioning in my phone so i returned it. I got a little annoyed with the TV feature popping up all the time but i never had any trouble except with the IM function. It never worked and i couldn't send out messages. If it allowed me to it took 3-4 tries. Other than that i had no problem. Battery held charge for days. The inbox didn't hold too many texts which was kinda annoying too but not a big deal.

Reviews.Title: A+++ seller
Reviews.Author: Rodney
Reviews.Content: Great seller. There was a small misunderstanding (on my end) and they quickly went above-and-beyond to make sure I was happy.  Lightning fast service and the product works as described.  I would definitely purchase again.

Reviews.Title: Charging problem and terrible service
Reviews.Author: Mukesh
Reviews.Content: The phone had a charging problem from day one, but I thought it will get better. However, I was proved wrong and it became worse with time. I hardly used tone the phone for three months and finally this phone does not charge anymore and is a piece of junk now. I would not suggest anyone to buy this phone even if it is given very cheap. I experienced more problems than benefits from the phone.

Reviews.Title: cellphone unlocked
Reviews.Author: azz
Reviews.Content: so far the phone has done just fine. it does what it says it will do, make an receive calls, takes great pictures, sound is clear good speaker, keeps contacts.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Pat
Reviews.Content: Phone works well and is user friendly.  No problems.  Good phone for persons with minor sight problems, easy to read and work with.

Reviews.Title: Missing items
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Solis G "Cesar"
Reviews.Content: It was advertised the phone comes with headphones and usb cable, but it doesn't. Definitively, I wasn't expecting this, but all what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: bad phone ,it burned up in a week
Reviews.Author: margaret e turk
Reviews.Content: Igot the phone for my niece she charged it on the charger and it burned up, it got sohot it completly burned

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: nikki
Reviews.Content: A decent phone for being "outdated " obviously not as good as the newer smartphones but cant complain for the price

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: paulorojas
Reviews.Content: this product is ok, i recomended, the service is fast, all rigth, the price is the exact. very very good

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: grace2
Reviews.Content: love this phone esay to uses,and simple ,fast service , goood price,i uses this phone in another country ant is was great

Reviews.Title: Good, but basic
Reviews.Author: evilchixor "evilcH1x0r"
Reviews.Content: I have been using it for a week by now, came all new and just with the charger (didn't said it will came with anything else) the touchscreen is really good, very sensitive. Looks like a really basic phone, has a few games but none of them free, all are trial.It has a useful lock button, so the touchscreen and the 3 buttons won't press randomly in the pocket (or wherever else).Take kind of good pictures, a little sensitive to moves, but good overall.I still can't find how to connect the wi-fi, haven't done a research yet; after putting in it a micro sd with a few songs in it, an error message appeared saying there were too big to play (but yet, I haven't done my research.Feels lightweight, good design, works well... but as I said kind of basic.Overall a fine phone, will write more later when I have time to try to resolve the stuff I haven't find how to make it work.____________________I have like, 9 months using it, the phone really don't have wi-fi and only can surf on the internet if you buy a package from your operator... I did but days later (and until today) it cannot connect anymore, i am trying so hard to sell it...Is kind of tricky to get to the mp3 player, has a kind of great camera...Stills functions well, but is not what I want

Reviews.Title: Good when it works
Reviews.Author: PC Guy
Reviews.Content: The phone worked for only three months then stop recognizing my sim card i am so dissapointed when it worked it was good but i should have bought an android instead

Reviews.Title: This phone was like a toy.
Reviews.Author: Francis M. Adjei "forekomf7"
Reviews.Content: I don't have much to write about this phone. It looked like a toy and because I was in a hurry to leave for Ghana, I couldn't return it and I have to go give it as a gift and I realised the person I gave it to didn't like it. I bought seven phones within that time and this was the bag one among them.

Reviews.Title: Wondering
Reviews.Author: stefani
Reviews.Content: im waiting for my pone to come in and i was wondering if it came with a charger? ive read oter reviews and i really hope this phone is alot better than the reviews say. If not i will return it.

Reviews.Title: Look elsewhere
Reviews.Author: Laura B. Mckenzie "Laura Brown Mckenzie"
Reviews.Content: The biggest problem with the phone is that the touch screen is either too sensitive or not sensitive enough... just depending on how it feels any given day.  In addition, any time you make a call and need to use a key pad, you'll find the key pad on this phone difficult, unwieldy and unworkable.  Did I mention that about 30% of the time a call to someone will come about that you can hear them but they can't hear you?  Or that you'll miss calls even though you have service because the phone decided to not ring?  I don't know why I kept it... I guess at the time I was too busy to return it. I only have two more months before I can get a new phone. I can't wait.  To be fair, I have liked using the mp3 option on the phone and the battery has lasted well.  That is why I gave it two stars.

Reviews.Title: l hate it
Reviews.Author: JB
Reviews.Content: I regret a lot buying this phone, this is not good at all. freezing screen, mess up touch, not good for internet service. now its broke cuz the toucg is mess up you have to squeeze it all the time so that you can at least type something. it made me so nervous in a point l squeezed to hard and broke the screen now l put it in trash can to throw it away. l lost my money. Please peopel spay away from that phone cus its gonna drive you crazy.

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
2-megapixel camera with video recording, Bluetooth for communication headsets and stereo headphones, microSD expansion to 4 GB
Access AT&T;'s speedy dual-band 3G network; compatible with AT&T; Mobile TV, AT&T; Music and Video Share services
Up to 3 hours of talk time, up to 250 hours (10.5 days) of standby time; measures 4.25 x 2.16 x 0.51 inches (HxWxD)
ProductInfo.Name: LG VU CU920 QuadBand Unlocked Phone with 2 MP Camera, Touch Screen and MP3 Player - International Version - Black
